title: Mission Impossible Dead Reckoning Trailer Reaction & Breakdown
description:
Go to http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 15% off your first order.

Tim, Nick, and Andy break down the first trailer for Mission Impossible 7 and absoluetely lose their minds.
